prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek design and a powerful cannon arm.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a deep-sea creature with vibrant blue colors and unique features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines aquatic traits with a futuristic robotic look.
Generate a character that is part lobster and part dragon, with striking color contrasts.
Design a Pokemon that has a large, vibrant shell and a cool underwater combat style.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean, featuring shades of blue and yellow.
I want a Pokemon that looks like an undersea warrior with advanced weaponry and elegant fins.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Ranged attacks with powerful water blasts
